Player History
Injured on 5/24/1965 with a Bruised Foot, out for 4 days...
Injured on 4/16/1972 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Cincinnati in 1975...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1977, off Jerry Koosman (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/5/1977, off Doyle Alexander (PHI)...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1978, hitting .366 with 4 HR, 15 RBI...
Injured on 4/9/1980 with a Inflamed Hamstring Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Atlanta on 6/27/1982...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1982, hitting .379 with 5 HR, 10 RBI...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1983, hitting .414 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
